partintro.para: This part describes the algorithms and equations used in FlashFit to fit, process, and convert measured data.

chapter.title: Fitting algorithm
chapter.para: FlashFit uses Newton-Gauss-Levenberg/Marquardt algorithm. It solves non-linear least squares problem.

partintro.para: This part describes the work which should be done.

chapter.title: Settings Dialogs Unification
chapter.para: The Appearance Dialog must be splitted into Axes Settings dialog and Information Header and Box Settings dialog.
The Axes Settings dialog allows to set Time axis and Absorbance axis values.

The Information Header and Box Settings dialog allows to set the font of the information box, k(x) precision, and the place where various values should be visible (header, box, none). It also allows to show/hide the information header and box. These possibilities replace the Show menu entry in the main window's menu bar. The Show menu entry must be removed.
